name: Refraction (itch) (warspiteful, FutureYou)
description:
Controls: WAD

This game was created for Trijam 113 Theme: Rainbow.

Overview

Refraction is a platformer where the player navigates airborne levels, bouncing off of raindrops while trying to collect the six hearts necessary to unlock the way forward.  The idea of the game drew from the refraction that light experiences when it passes through water, deflecting from its original path.

Goal
Collect all of the rainbow hearts and get through the portal

Engine

Godot 3.2.1

Development Time

~2 hours, 50 min each

Credits:

  • Original Art and Programming Done by Warspiteful - Twitter
  • Level Design, Music and SFX by FutureYou - Twitter | Soundcloud
